export function userReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:null;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case"LOGIN":return action.payload;//เก็บค่า token, username, role
case"LOGOUT":localStorage.clear();//ลบค่า token ใน localstorage
return action.payload;//ค่า null
default:return state;}}
